= Status on the usage of observations in Harmonie =

= Purpose =

Basic Idea is to have a user driven working week where we can share experiences, present results and ongoing work as well
as discuss problem and work on solutions.
 
  *  to provide a status update and a platform for discussion and future work: 
  * the local experience at the NMS's in implementing and assimilating high-resolution high-frequency observations in HARMONIE;
  * Progress on the radar data assimilation in the local setups
  * Radar data exchange server and quality control options
  * Experiences, availability and usage of Mode-S, GNSS and Radiance Data
  * COPE and ODB information and discussion
  * Radar data format HDF5, and the maintenance of Conrad
  * Status on the proposed observation action groups
  * Blacklisting and tuning of the DA system

NOTE: Regardless of which hotel you use the easiest way to get to DMI is to take the S-trains. The A and H line passes the Ryparken Station where DMI is located. Just make sure that you take it in the right direction, tickets are available from vending machines in the stations.
